articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Newly-built Medical Oxygen Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Newly-built Medical Oxygen Factory
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the newly-built Medical Oxygen Factory.
					 The factory, whose all processes are automated and computerized, is an advanced medical oxygen production and supply base for hospitals.
					
					 Kim Jong Un went round oxygen separating station, gas oxygen filling station, oxygen supply station and other parts of the factory to learn in detail about its construction and operation plan.
					
					 He was satisfied with everything, noting that an integrated production system has been established well at the factory, every production process is fully equipped with modern facilities and it has a car for delivering medical oxygen.
					
					 Recalling his instruction that an oxygen supply station should be built for hospitals to get medical oxygen without any inconvenience, he said the station is flawless in aspects of architectural beauty, convenience and utility.
					
					 He said that he is pleasant to see oxygen cylinders standing in rows at the station, each bearing a name of hospital to be supplied.
					
					 The factory is a small yet big one as it is greatly conducive to the protection of people's lives and improvement of their health, he said and set forth the tasks facing it. And he gave an instruction that such modern medical oxygen production base should be built in different parts of the country on the basis of the achievements made in its construction.
					
					 When the factory begins its production to supply quality oxygen for treatment, people will get a great benefit from it, he said, adding: It is needed to make our people feel the advantages of the socialist system through such social benefits as the socialist health care system.
					
					 There are many things for us to do, but we attach primary attention to the public health service, because it represents the socialist system and is a very important work to give full play to the advantages of our socialist healthcare system, the only system in the world, through which the Party and the state take care of the people's lives and health with responsibility, he said.
					
					 He stressed the need to direct sustained efforts to consolidating the material and technical foundations of health service in order to make the country's healthcare system the most popular and advanced one of world level.
					
					 He expressed belief that the officials and employees of the factory would fully discharge their honorable duty with a firm will to contribute to the people's health improvement.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice-Chairman Choe Thae Bok and Vice Department Director Kang Pong Hun of the WPK Central Committee and Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the State Affairs Commission.

articles.title: NPCK Spokesman Accuses Park Geun Hye Group of Trying to Deploy THAAD
articles.content:
NPCK Spokesman Accuses Park Geun Hye Group of Trying to Deploy THAAD
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group, stunned by the DPRK's successful nuclear warhead explosion test, is now going reckless to deploy THAAD in south Korea at any cost with this as an excuse.
					 Traitor Park is viciously inciting "crisis of security" and hostility toward the DPRK as if she had got a golden opportunity, crying out for "extremely grave situation of state emergency level" and "readiness to end the north's regime." And she is cunningly trying to prevent the no-THAAD campaign of south Korean people from all walks of life on this opportunity while trumpeting about "strong counteraction".
					
					 At an "emergency meeting for examining security situation," "state council meeting" and talks with representatives of the ruling party and two opposition parties she talked rubbish that "she cannot but deploy THAAD" and she "would push forward THAAD deployment more swiftly" and, at same time, unhesitatingly revealed sinister attempt to suppress the opposition parties and people of all social standings against THAAD deployment, branding them as "undesirable forces" and "forces creating social uneasiness".
					
					 A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea (NPCK) in a statement on Thursday said this shows what reckless phase the Park group's traitorous hysteria against the DPRK has reached.
					
					 However, it is nothing but a bluff of Park frightened by the rapid development of the nuclear force of the DPRK on a high level, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 Though THAAD is deployed in south Korea, there will be no change in the destiny of the U.S. reaching a terminal of ruin and in the plight of the Park group clinging its coattails.
					
					 It is ignorant and foolish for Park to deter the smaller, lighter and diversified nuclear attack means of the DPRK with U.S. THAAD.
					
					 The Park group would be well advised to stop acting rashly, pondering over what extent the strategic position of the DPRK has reach and how dangerous the situation will be.
					
					 The group of traitors had better listen carefully to the DPRK's warnings that their heinous political and military provocation will incur merciless nuclear strike to lead them to a final ruin.
					
					 All Koreans should never tolerate the moves of the Park group to deploy THAAD bringing horrible nuclear disaster to this land.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations and Delegates Here for Pyongyang International Film Festival
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations and Delegates Here for Pyongyang International Film Festival
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates from Germany, Russia, Sweden, China, Britain, Austria and other countries arrived here on Thursday to participate in the 15th Pyongyang International Film Festival.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Cemeteries of Martyrs
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Cemeteries of Martyrs
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Wreathes were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Thursday, the Harvest Moon Day.
					 Wreaths in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), were seen on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, committees, ministries and national institutions and service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and working people in the city.
					
					 Wreaths in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet were laid on the wreath-laying stands of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri, a wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 Laid before the cemeteries were wreaths in the names of the armed forces organs, working people's organizations, committees, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and KPISF, institutions of science, education, public health, literature and art and media, and party and power organs, enterprises, universities and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the martyrs and looked round the cemeteries.
					
					 On the same day wreaths were placed before the statues of the martyrs, cemeteries and monuments to the fallen fighters of the KPA across the country.

articles.title: Relief Aids Supplied to Flood Victims
articles.content:
Relief Aids Supplied to Flood Victims
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- All the people of in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have turned out in a campaign to assist the inhabitants in the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province.
					 Light industrial establishments in the capital city of Pyongyang and Sinuiju City of North Phyongan Province strive to boost the production of daily necessities to be supplied to the flood victims.
					
					 South Hamgyong Province had already supplied more than 40,000 items of daily necessities in 32 kinds. And building materials for rehabilitation produced by industrial establishments of the province, including Puraesan Cement Factory and February 8 Vinalon Complex, are sent in succession to the flood-hit areas.
					
					 South Phyongan Province, in particular, offered several hundred tons of cement and a great deal of relief goods, including food, clothes, shoes, utensils, blankets, quilts and medicines one day after the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea made an appeal calling for all-out recovery efforts.
					
					 Meanwhile, an art agitation squad consisting of those from Phibada Opera Troupe, National Circus, National Theatrical Troupe and other art troupes, left Pyongyang for North Hamgyong Province to encourage the flood victims and the relief workers, implanting in their mind the intention of the WPK which decided to direct the main thrust of the 200-day campaign to the flood damage rehabilitation drive.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful in World Taekwon-Do Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful in World Taekwon-Do Championships
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK players won four trophies, 17 gold, 8 silver and 2 bronze medals, thus coming first in the countries' standings at the 12th World Juvenile Taekwon-Do Championships and the 7th World Veteran Taekwon-Do Championships.
					 The championships took place in Italy from Sep. 7 to 11. DPRK players participated in the World Juvenile Taekwon-Do Championships which brought together 370 players from 40 countries and regions including Argentina, Australia, and Belarus.
					
					 They won in the boys and girls individual sparring matches, girls team sparring matches, boys and girls  team pattern competitions and individual pattern competitions, boys and girls self-defense matches and girls individual special technique competition.
					
					 Ri Du Song placed first in boys 51 kg individual sparring match in the age category of 16-17 and Sin Guk Hui, Won Ok, Han Ryong Hwa, Kim Yu Sim and Pak Sol Hyang in girls 64 kg, 58 kg, 52 kg, 46 kg and 40 kg individual sparring matches in the age category of 16-17.
					
					 Ro Guk Hwa and Kim Jin A came first in girls 52 kg and 46 kg individual sparring matches in the age category of 14-15.
					
					 Sin Hyon Il came first in boys individual pattern competition of 2nd degree, Kim Jin A and Won Ok in girls individual pattern competitions of 1st and 3rd degrees and Pak Ji Hyang in girls individual special technique competition.
					
					 The DPRK players finished second in girls team special technique competitions.
					
					 Sin Hyon Il bagged silver medal in boys 57 kg individual sparring match in the age category of 16-17, Jong Rim and Won Hye Song silver medals in 70 kg and above individual sparring matches in the age category of 16-17 and Pak Ji Hyang and Sin Guk Hwa in girls 40 kg and 58 kg individual sparring matches in the age category of 14-15.
					
					 Choe Ryong Bom came second in boys individual pattern competition of 1st degree and Sin Guk Hui in girls individual pattern competition of 2nd degree.
					
					 Tokgo Chol Bom won a bronze medal in boys 69 kg individual sparring match in the age category of 16-17 and Pae Jin Sok also bagged a bronze in boys individual pattern competition of 3rd degree.
					
					 They returned home on Thursday.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Great Nationwide Conference for Reunification Success
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Great Nationwide Conference for Reunification Success
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- It is the urgent task for tiding over grave difficulties and achieving independent reunification of the country to open a great nationwide conference for reunification, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 However, the Park Geun Hye group is making desperate efforts to block the nationwide conference, kicking up an anti-DPRK confrontation racket in collusion with outside forces in utter disregard of the aspiration and wishes of all Koreans.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the Park group of traitors are a group of wicked confrontation maniacs dead-set against the improvement of the north-south relations and peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 If the south Korean puppet regime persistently takes the road of confrontation with the fellow countrymen and war against the north in collusion with outside forces, quite contrary to the Koreans’ ardent enthusiasm for reunification, they will not be able to escape history's stern judgment and final ruin
					
					 The Park group should bear in mind that their stubborn opposition to the great nationwide conference for reunification would spark off bitter anger and hatred for the regime of traitors and precipitate their doomsday.
					
					 The broad pro-reunification patriotic forces in the north, south and abroad will firmly unite as one and surely hold the great nationwide conference and wage a dynamic struggle for paving a wide avenue for independent reunification no matter how desperately the south Korean puppet group may work.
					
					 They would be well advised to face up to the unbreakable will of the nation for independent reunification and behave themselves.

articles.title: U.S. Forces in South Korea Are Cancer-like Entity Harassing Peace on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in South Korea Are Cancer-like Entity Harassing Peace on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) --  The U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea was an act of aggression perpetrated by them with a sinister aim to secure a bridgehead for realizing the ambition to dominate Asia and the rest of the world by conquering the whole of Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Under the U.S. forces' occupation south Korea turned into their military base and outpost of nuclear war for invading the whole of Korea and Asia and dominating the world. Consequently, the Korean nation has been exposed to constant threat of war.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea are the heinous group of robbers who have trampled down the right of the south Korean people to live and the military executors of the U.S. imperialists' policy of dominating the whole of Korea aimed to disturb peace on the Korean peninsula and block its reunification.
					
					 They are not "guardian of peace" but the root cause of evils causing all sorts of misfortunes and sufferings and instability on the peninsula.
					
					 As long as the U.S. imperialist aggression forces are present in south Korea, peace can neither settle on this land nor can reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, be achieved nor the danger of a nuclear war be defused.
					
					 The withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea is the primary task for ensuring lasting peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The Korean nation does not wish to see the continued presence of the U.S. forces in south Korea as they were not invited.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should intensify the struggle for driving the U.S. imperialist aggression forces out of south Korea through their concerted efforts and thus preserve peace and security of the nation and hasten the accomplishment of the historic cause of reunification.

articles.title: Sex Traffic Prevalent in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sex Traffic Prevalent in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Nowadays, sex traffic is on the increase in south Korea.
					 According to the information from puppet police, nearly 600 criminals were arrested last year alone for acting as brokers in sex traffic abroad.
					
					 Sex traffic including the one for foreigners through internet is on the steady increase in every part of south Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Diplomat Assaults S. Korean Taxi Driver
articles.content:
U.S. Diplomat Assaults S. Korean Taxi Driver
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A heavily drunken diplomat of the U.S. embassy resorted to violence against a Taxi driver in Ryongsan, Seoul, on Sep. 9, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 It was said that he committed provocations and assaulted the driver several times.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the criminal has been free from any punishment, enjoying diplomatic privileges.
					
					 As long as foreign forces lord it over south Korea and pro-U.S. lackeys hold sway over it, the south Korean people can never escape the fate of being victims of their crimes.

articles.title: Incompetence of S. Korean Puppet Group Criticized
articles.content:
Incompetence of S. Korean Puppet Group Criticized
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Former and incumbent south Korean National Assemblymen criticized the incompetence of the puppet group on September 7, according to south Korean newspapers Hangyore and Herald Kyongje.
					 Pak Yong Son from the Minju Party of south Korea in a press conference disclosed the fact that the puppet conservative authorities missed the chance to put the marine transportation on a normal track.
					
					 He noted that the Lee Myung Bak regime talked about the restructuring in its much touted proposal on increasing the competitive power of the marine transportation in 2009 but it ended in failure.
					
					 And there were four chances for the Park Geun Hye regime to normalize the marine transportation but the incompetent regime missed them all, he said.
					
					 In a word, the chaos in the business is a disaster caused by arbitrary practices of the owners of enterprises and incompetence of the regime, he commented.
					
					 Meantime, former lawmaker Ri Jae O from the Saenuri Party in his broadcasting appearance noted that the Park conservative regime is so incompetent and corrupt that it has gone beyond the tolerance limit, adding that the incompetent Saenuri Party is not capable of coping with the global situation as it has only conservative elements.

articles.title: Chongryon Strongly Reacts to Japanese Reactionaries' Grave Provocations
articles.content:
Chongryon Strongly Reacts to Japanese Reactionaries' Grave Provocations
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are getting frantic with moves against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), fear-stricken by the DPRK's bolstering of its nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					 Upon hearing the news of the successful nuclear warhead explosion test of the DPRK on Sep. 9, the Japanese chief executive cried out for tightening the sanctions against the DPRK and the ruling and opposition parties discussed on adopting a "resolution on condemning north Korea."
					
					 Japanese media are spouting a whole string of vituperation slandering the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK in a bid to build up public opinion critical of the DPRK in Japanese society.
					
					 Meanwhile, from that day right-wing gangsters' organizations made much fuss around the Hall of the Central Hall of Chongryon every day after bringing loudspeaker vans. They perpetrated hooliganism in front of its gate.
					
					 Some groups of them even attempted to break into the hall in succession.
					
					 The Central Standing Committee of Chongryon decided to hold an emergency consultative meeting to take strong countermeasures to cope with the situation in which the moves of the Japanese reactionaries against the DPRK and Chongryon have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 It took organizational measures not only to widely explain the statement released by the Nuclear Weapons Institute of the DPRK and the great significance of the successful nuclear warhead explosion test among the compatriots but to protect the organizations and institutions at various levels and ensure the safety of the compatriots including students.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Pakistan, Sweden, Mexico
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Pakistan, Sweden, Mexico
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Pakistan, Sweden and Mexico on September 7 and 8 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The reporter and speakers including the secretary general of the Karachi branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for having turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defense, satellite manufacturer and launcher, nuclear weapons state and a socialist paradise centered on the popular masses.
					
					 They were convinced that the feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in strengthening the DPRK and accomplishing the cause of global independence will be kept in the hearts of mankind forever.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Il Sung laid the eternal foundation for the DPRK to win victory after victory under the unfurled banner of Juche.
					
					 The DPRK is shedding its rays as a beacon of hope of world progressive mankind, he noted.
					
					 He extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people working miracles in the struggle to increase the defense capability, build an economic power and reunify the country, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The secretary general of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and other speakers underlined the need to further deepen the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and widely introduce the DPRK in which the dream and ideal of the people are being translated into a reality.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Sweden.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversary Marked in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversary Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- A Korean photo and book exhibition and film show took place at the foreign children's literature library named after Pushkin in Sankt-Peterburg City, Russia on Sept. 9, the 68th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venue of the event were photos showing the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were also works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books dealing with their greatness and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The vice-director of the cultural committee of the Sankt-Peterburg City hoped that he would be able to know well about the DPRK through such exhibition, film show and other colorful cultural exchanges.
					
					 The vice chief of the library said that he could realize the DPRK's development through the exhibition, hoping that the Korean people would prosper.
					
					 The director of the Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia said that he learned a lot of thing from the DPRK as he could see new things created every time he visited it. The DPRK is the country committed to its cause despite the U.S. sanctions and blockade.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean film "The Arch Criminal who Ignited Korean War".

articles.title: DPRK Is Invincible: Angolan Personage
articles.content:
DPRK Is Invincible: Angolan Personage
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The international secretary of the Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola made public a statement on September 8 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 He said that the DPRK was founded on September 9, 1948, 68 years ago thanks to the outstanding leadership of President Kim Il Sung who won a brilliant victory in the anti-Japanese war through the nationwide sacred war.
					
					 The founding of the DPRK enabled the Korean people to enjoy an independent and dignified life as the master of their destiny and the full-fledged master of the state and society, free from the status as the colonial slaves, he noted.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into an invincible socialist power thanks to the feats of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il and the Songun leadership of HE Kim Jong Un, he pointed out.
					
					 He said that the Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola wished the Korean people greater successes in their struggle to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, convinced that the DPRK will always emerge victorious under the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Italian Body Supports Korean People
articles.content:
Italian Body Supports Korean People
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Italian Organization for Friendship and Support to DPRK in a statement on September 9 said that September 9 is the auspicious holiday of not only the Korean people but the world people advocating the Juche idea and following socialist Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK which has created the history of justice and invincibility for the past over 68 years under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea is instilling the firm conviction of victory of socialism into us.
					
					 The Korean people have made eye-opening achievements in all fields, shattering the unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK by the imperialists and their followers to stifle socialist Korea.
					
					 We are sincerely rejoiced over the fact that the DPRK has reached a new high stage of bolstering the nuclear force.
					
					 We are convinced that the DPRK's nuclear deterrence is greatly contributing to defending peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 We, following the Juche idea founded, developed and enriched by President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il, the eternal leaders of the Korean people, will positively support the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Cuban Paper
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Cuban Paper
Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Cuban paper Granma on September 9 carried special write-up titled "Uninterrupted advance toward building socialist power" on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 It carried photos of the Korean people visiting the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paying high tribute to them.
					
					 It said that Kim Il Sung powerfully aroused the entire nation to the sacred war for liberating the country, putting an end to the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists, and founded the DPRK on September 9, 1948 and wisely led it along the path of socialism.
					
					 It noted that the DPRK is socialism centered on the popular masses guided by the Juche idea and it has demonstrated its might before the world as a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defense and a country of single-minded unity under the outstanding guidance of the great leaders.
					
					 It pointed out that under the unstable situation on the Korean peninsula, the DPRK is bolstering self-defensive force in quality and quantity, firmly building the tremendous military muscle capable of coping with the enemy. In other words, it is further building up the army and developing the nuclear attack capability.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Support DPRK's Successful Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Support DPRK's Successful Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on September 10.
					 The statement said that the DRPK conducted a nuclear warhead explosion test under the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea on building a strategic nuclear force.
					
					 The test was a just and legitimate step of socialist Korea to cope with the U.S. imperialists' ceaseless nuclear threat, it noted.
					
					 The successful nuclear warhead explosion test made it possible to more firmly guarantee peace and security on the Korean peninsula, it pointed out.
					
					 The U.S. claim that the DPRK's nuclear test is a "threat to peace" is nothing but nonsensical sophism, it said, and went on:
					
					 We extend heartfelt congratulations to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK and its army and people on the successful nuclear warhead explosion test.

articles.title: Brazilian Body Congratulates DPRK's Successful Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test
articles.content:
Brazilian Body Congratulates DPRK's Successful Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in a statement on September 10 congratulated the DPRK on its successful nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 The statement said that the DPRK successfully conducted the nuclear warhead explosion test, fully demonstrating once again the might as an independent nuclear power.
					
					 The DPRK, which beat back the aggression by the U.S. imperialists and their followers in the 1950s, has fully prepared itself to eliminate any enemy from the earth without mercy, the statement noted.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il is remarkably strengthening the might of the DPRK, it pointed out.
					
					 The world progressive people are extending warm congratulations to the Korean people winning only victories in the struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country under the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Un, it added.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Syrian, Peruvian Personages
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Syrian, Peruvian Personages
 Pyongyang, September 15 (KCNA) -- Syrian and Peruvian personages issued statements on September 8 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Saber Ballul, head of the Department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus of Syria, said the founding of the DPRK made it possible for the Korean people to become an independent people and the DPRK an independent country.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into an invincible fortress defending and materializing the demand and interests of the people and made every effort to develop science and technology, achieving world-startling achievements in all fields including politics, economy and culture, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK is a genuine country for the people.
					
					 The Korean people are enjoying a happy life thanks to the popular policies of the state, not knowing what "tax" is.
					
					 The DPRK is a country of single-minded unity admired and envied by the world.
					
					 Julio Cesar Pantigoso Barretto, chairman of the Chiclayo and Trujillo Branch of the Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship, said:
					
					 I sincerely wish the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un greater success in his noble work on the occasion of September 9.
					
					 The might of the DPRK has further increased under his leadership.
					
					 The Korean people are registering great achievements in building a socialist power.
					
					 This is greatly encouraging the world progressive people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Fabrica de Oxigeno Medicinal nuevamente construida
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden homenaje a martires en ocasion de fiesta otonal
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo de Chusok (fiesta otonal, el 15 de agosto lunar) fueron depositadas el dia 15 las ofrendas florales ante el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong, el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en la comuna Sinmi y el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					　Estaban colocadas alli las ofrendas florales enviadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					　En las ceremonias de homenaje participaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades trabajadoras, comites, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					　Fueron colocadas las ofrendas florales a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Comite de Estado de la RPDC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong y el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en la comuna Sinmi, y la otra a nombre comun del CC y la Comision Militar Central, del PTC, y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC en la plataforma "Espiritu de Heroes" del Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					　Ademas, fueron puestas las ofrendas florales a nombre de la instituciones de fuerzas armadas, las entidades trabajadoras, los comites, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las unidades del EPC y del ESIPC, las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, salud publica, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, los organismos del partido y el Poder, empresas, universidades y granjas en esta capital.
					
					　Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires y recorrieron los cementerios.
					
					　El mismo dia, fueron colocadas las ofrendas florales ante las estatuas de bronce y los cementerios de los martires, el monumento a los martires del ejercito popular y sus tumbas, en distintos lugares.

articles.title: Coreanos rinden homenaje a martires en ocasion de fiesta otonal
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden homenaje a martires en ocasion de fiesta otonal
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo de Chusok (fiesta otonal, el 15 de agosto lunar) fueron depositadas el dia 15 las ofrendas florales ante el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong, el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en la comuna Sinmi y el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					Estaban colocadas alli las ofrendas florales enviadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					En las ceremonias de homenaje participaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades trabajadoras, comites, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron colocadas las ofrendas florales a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Comite de Estado de la RPDC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong y el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en la comuna Sinmi, y la otra a nombre comun del CC y la Comision Militar Central, del PTC, y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC en la plataforma "Espiritu de Heroes" del Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Ademas, fueron puestas las ofrendas florales a nombre de la instituciones de fuerzas armadas, las entidades trabajadoras, los comites, los ministerios, los organos centrales, las unidades del EPC y del ESIPC, las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, salud publica, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion, los organismos del partido y el Poder, empresas, universidades y granjas en esta capital.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires y recorrieron los cementerios.
					
					El mismo dia, fueron colocadas las ofrendas florales ante las estatuas de bronce y los cementerios de los martires, el monumento a los martires del ejercito popular y sus tumbas, en distintos lugares.

articles.title: Todo el pais ofrece sincera asistencia a la reconstruccion de zona danada
articles.content:
Todo el pais ofrece sincera asistencia a la reconstruccion de zona danada
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Todos los coreanos ofrecen activa asistencia a la reconstruccion de la zona septentrional damnificada.
					En la ciudad de Pyongyang y la de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, en que estan concentradas las bases de la industria ligera, y otros lugares se desarrolla la campana de produccion de los articulos de primera necesidad para enviar a los habitantes de la zona afectada.
					
					La provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, colindante con la provincia damnificada, se levanto en las labores para ayudar a los damnificados
					
					El funcionario del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Hamhung, Yu Hong Il, dijo que ofrecer sincera ayuda a las personas que sufrieron danos es la tradicion del pueblo coreano y ayudarse mutuamente cada vez que sea dificil es el mejor rasgo de la sociedad. Y agrego que ayudar con sinceridad aunque aprieta mas nuestro cinturon es el sentimiento sincero de los ciudadanos de Hamhung.
					
					Partio el primer tren con mas de 40 mil articulos de 32 generos y otros materiales donados por los habitantes de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y fueron enviados los materiales necesarios a la reconstruccion, producidos en la Fabrica de Cemento de Puraesan, el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y otras fabricas y empresas de la provincia.
					
					La provincia de Phyong-an del Sur envio al frente de reconstruccion los constructores y los obreros calificados y las herramientas, los vehiculos y los abastecimientos, producidos mediante la campana nocturna.
					
					Solo en un dia despues de ser publicado el llamamiento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, fueron donados una gran cantidad de materias de socorro inclusive cientos de toneladas de cemento, gran cantidad de alimentos, ropas y calzados, utensilios de cocina y muebles, articulos de primera necesidad y medicamentos.
					
					Por otra parte, el grupo de agitacion economica formado con los artistas del Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre, el Conjunto Circense Nacional, el Conjunto Dramatico Nacional y otras entidades artisticas, partio antes que nadie a la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte para animar e infundir a los habitantes de la zona danada y los constructores el proposito del PTC que definio los trabajos por la rehabilitacion de la zona damnificada como el rumbo principal de la campana de 200 dias.

articles.title: Taekwondoistas coreanos sobresalen en campeonato mundial
articles.content:
Taekwondoistas coreanos sobresalen en campeonato mundial
Pyongyang, 15 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En el XII Campeonato Mundial de Jovenes de Taekwondo y el VII Campeonato Mundial de Veteranos de Taekwondo, los jugadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ocuparon el primer lugar en el orden general de los paises al ganar 4 copas, 17 medallas de oro, 8 de plata y 2 de bronce.
					En la competencia de jovenes del campeonato, efectuado desde el dia 7 hasta el 11 en Italia, participaron mas de 370 jugadores de ambos sexos de 40 paises y regiones inclusive la RPDC, Argentina, Australia y Belarus.
					
					Ellos ganaron en el juego individual de parrins de ambos sexos, el colectivo de parrins (f), el juego colectivo de pattern de ambos sexos, el individual de pattern de ambos sexos, el juego de defensa personal de ambos sexos y el juego individual (f) de tecnica especial, respectivamente.
					
					Ri Tu Song ocupo el primer lugar en parrins individual (m) de la division de 51kg de la categoria de edad 16-17 y Sin Kuk Hui, Won Ok, Han Ryong Hwa, Kim Yu Sim y Pak Sol Hyang, en parrins individual (f) de las divisiones de 64kg, 58kg, 52kg, 46kg y 40kg de la categoria 16-17, respectivamente.
					
					Ro Kuk Hwa y Kim Jin A triunfaron respectivamente en parrins individual (f) de la division de 52kg y la de 46kg de la categoria 14-15.
					
					Sin Hyon Il gano la medalla de oro en el pattern individual (m) del segundo grado, Kim Jin A y Won Ok, en pattern individual (f) del primer y tercer grados y Pak Ji Hyang, en la tecnica especial individual (f), respectivamente.
					
					En el juego colectivo (f) de tecnica especial, las taekwondoistas coreanas ocuparon el segundo lugar.
					
					Obtuvieron medallas de plata Sin Hyon Il en el parrins individual (m) de la division de 57kg de la categoria 16-17, Jong Rim y Won Hye Song en la division de 70kg y la de mas de 70kg de misma categoria y Pak Ji Hyang y Sin Kuk Hwa en parrins individual (f) de las divisiones de 40kg y 58kg de la categoria 14-15, respectivamente.
					
					Ocuparon el segundo lugar Choe Ryong Bom en el pattern individual (m) del primer grado y Sin Kuk Hui en el pattern individual (f) del segundo grado.
					
					Por otra parte, ganaron medalla de bronce Tokgo Chol Bom y Pae Jin Sok, en el parrins individual (m) de la division de 69kg de la categoria 16-17 y el pattern individual (m) del tercer grado, respectivamente.
					
					El dia 15, los jugadores coreanos regresaron a la patria.
